messages.subject: Traveling unschool Dad
messages.msgSnippet: Hi all, I have a request...my dh is driving back here to TN from Washington state tomorrow. We just moved, so saving money is really important right now,
messages.messageBody:
Hi all,

I have a request...my dh is driving back here to TN from Washington
state tomorrow. We just moved, so saving money is really important
right now, therefore I'm trying to find unschool families he can stay
with overnight.
He's really laid back (a bit introverted at times) and easy going, so
not much bother.:)
His route is South on I-5 from the Portland area (to avoid all the bad
weather) then East on Hwy. 40. He'll be covered in Albuquerque, but
I'm trying to figure out somewhere near Medford or Redding, maybe
Bakersfield....places near I-5 and then somewhere off 40 in AZ
(perhaps near Flagstaff?).

Would you write me if you're willing to put an unschooling Dad up for
a night?

Thanks so much everyone!

Ren
learninginfreedom.com
